solution_line_template: After this week, Michelangelo will have {total_ceilings}-{painted_this_week}=<<{total_ceilings}-{painted_this_week}={remaining_after_this_week}>>{remaining_after_this_week} more ceilings to paint.
Next week, Michelangelo will paint {painted_this_week}/{fraction_denominator}=<<{painted_this_week}/{fraction_denominator}={painted_next_week}>>{painted_next_week} ceilings.

Michelangelo will have {remaining_after_this_week}-{painted_next_week}=<<{remaining_after_this_week}-{painted_next_week}={remaining_after_next_week}>>{remaining_after_next_week} more ceilings to paint.
